HotelElement.Name: NH Berlin Potsdam Conference Center (Formerly NH Berlin Potsdam)

Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Kleinmachnow, NH Berlin Potsdam Conference Center is in a rural location and within the vicinity of Strandbad Wannsee and Free University of Berlin. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Dahlem Museums Complex and Babelsberg Film Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 243 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as a sauna and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of NH Berlin Potsdam Conference Center. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of NH Berlin Potsdam Conference Center. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Strandbad Wannsee - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Free University of Berlin - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi
Dahlem Museums Complex - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Babelsberg Film Park - 8 km / 4.9 mi
Botanical Garden - 8 km / 5 mi
Grunewald Tower - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Babelsberg Castle - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Park Babelsberg - 9.4 km / 5.8 mi
Gate of Fortune - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
St. Nicolas Church - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
CityCube Berlin - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
Nauener Gate - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi
Film Museum - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
Neuer Lustgarten - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi
Schaubuehne - 12.1 km / 7.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 17.5 km / 10.8 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 19.5 km / 12.1 mi

The preferred airport for NH Berlin Potsdam Conference Center is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Berlin-Tegel airport (TXL): Approximate driving time is 30 minutes and distance is 16 miles (25 kilometers).

Taxis are readily available outside the terminal. The airport bus connects to the underground system. There is also an express airport shuttle train service serving central Berlin.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
